title: On-Site Management, Business Center, Fitness Center with Free Weights
map_address: 11100 E Dartmouth Ave near Kenton Street
posting_body: ['Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'x 137', 'OR Text', '137', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to contact our team.', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 1000 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Welcome to The Felix Apartments, a beautiful community of studio, one-, and two-bedroom apartments in Denver, CO.', 'Designed with comfort and convenience in mind, each of our homes include efficient appliances, large walk-in closets, private patios or balconies, cozy fireplaces, and state-of-the-art security systems.', 'Additional options such as newly upgraded interiors, wood-style plank flooring, technology packages, and private yards are also available in select homes.', 'When you step out to discover everything that our community has to offer, we think you will be quite pleased with our array of fun and convenient amenities.', 'We offer a fitness center, racquetball and basketball court, a swimming pool, clubhouse with media and recreation rooms, and a business center.', 'Resident services are also in abundance and include off-street parking, on-site maintenance and management, laundry facilities, and package receiving.', 'With a playground for outdoor fun, and a pet park for your four-legged friend, we truly have something for everyone!', 'Surrounding our beautiful community, you will find a plethora of shopping, dining, and entertainment options to explore.', 'Just across the way is Cherry Creek Park which is a favorite locale of outdoor enthusiasts, offering camping, hiking, boating, horseback riding, archery, and an off-leash dog park.', 'Another benefit to residing in our one-bedroom apartments in Denver is easy access to public transportation, as well as interstates and highways, making it easy to get to Downtown and everything else wonderful that the surrounding mountains, forests, and cities have to offer.', 'It’s time that you experienced the best in residential living by coming home to The Felix Apartments.', 'Call today to schedule your tour!', 'Features:', 'Newly Renovated Studio, 1 & 2-Bedroom Apartments, Granite Countertops*, Private Patio or Balcony, Private Security Alarm, Walk-In Closets, Stainless Steel Appliances*, Wood-burning Fireplace*, Genuine Brick Walls, Faux Wood Flooring, Central Air Conditioning', '*In Select Homes', 'Community Amenities:', 'Pet Friendly Community with Bark Park & Paw Spa, 2 On-Site Laundry Facilities, Picnic Areas with BBQ Grills, Resident Lounge with Poker Tables, Outdoor Sport Court, Media Center, Playground, 2 Seasonal Resort Style Swimming Pools, Game Room with Shuffleboard, Foosball & Billiards, Indoor Basketball Court, Business Center, Fitness Center with Free Weights, 24-Hour Emergency Maintenance, Secure Package Acceptance, Coffee Bar, On-Site Management, Fire Pit', 'Pet Policy', 'We love your pets and are excited to welcome them to their new home!', 'We allow two pets per apartment home with a combined weight not exceed 160 lbs.', 'Cats and dogs are welcome at our community although some breed restrictions apply.', 'Pet Deposit for 1 Pet: $100', 'Pet Fee for 1 Pet: $300', 'Monthly Pet Rent for 1 Pet: $35', 'Pet Deposit for 2 Pets: $200', 'Pet Fee for 2 Pets: $400', 'Monthly Pet Rent for 2 Pets: $65', 'See our property details here:', '<URL>', 'iccZHMOB1w']
